ca.uqac.lif.textidote

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.Rule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckCaptions, CheckCiteMix, CheckFigurePaths, CheckFigureReferences, CheckLanguage, CheckLanguage.CheckLanguageSpecific, CheckNoBreak, CheckStackedHeadings, CheckStackedHeadings.CheckStackedHeadingsAdvice, CheckSubsections, CheckSubsections.CheckLevelSkip, CheckSubsections.CheckSubsectionOrder, CheckSubsectionSize, RegexRule

    public abstract class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
    Description of a condition that must apply on a piece of text. That condition can take multiple forms: a regular expression pattern that must/must not be found, etc.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé
